doc:
Greg Antonacci https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Antonacci 0 Gregory Gerald Antonacci (February 2, 1947 – September 20, 2017) was an American television actor, director, producer, and writer. He is best known for portraying Johnny Torrio in Boardwalk Empire in every season, from 2010 to 2014, and as Phil Leotardo's right-hand man Butch DeConcini in The Sopranos from 2006 to the season finale in 2007. Gregory_Gerald_Antonacci ( February_2_,_1947 – September_20_,_2017 ) was an_American_television_actor , director , producer , and writer . He is_best_known for portraying Johnny_Torrio in Boardwalk_Empire in every_season , from 2010 to 2014 , and as Phil_Leotardo 's_right-hand_man_Butch_DeConcini in The_Sopranos from 2006 to the_season_finale in 2007 .
